name: Village People (Nybble Studios)
description:
Village People!

Ludum Dare 35 — April 15th-18th, 2016 — Theme: Shapeshift

Original Game Entry

You are the Shaman of a town and you must protect your people from the Evil shape shifting pygmy goats from your sanctuary!

* Mouse to Aim
* Right click to reveal foes
* Left click to shoot arrows

~ Don't Kill your own people
~ Don't let the nasty Pygmy goat's in your sanctuary!
